content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Jan 2019what is the best and safe way to meet the credit card minimum spend ? ?Recently applied new card with minimum spend to get reward, without any desire to make big purchase, what is the best and safe way to meet the minimum requirement. I thought of buying Grocery voucher or movie voucher but don't think its work because buying voucher they charge additional GST etc. Come on, I know you guys a lot of trick. I need to spend 3000 within 3 months. It is not difficult to exceed 1000 in a month for my existing card. But now I think hard, I can't figure out how.2 answersAnswerBump0
